title: Virgin Galactic conducts final VSS Unity commercial suborbital spaceflight
summary: Virgin Galactic’s VSS Unity spaceplane conducted its final commercial mission June 8, taking a Turkish researcher and three private astronauts on a suborbital spaceflight.

title: Planet’s first hyperspectral satellite is ready to launch
summary: Planet’s first hyperspectral satellite is ready for launch to help push the Earth observation operator to profitability by early next year.

title: Space Force agency taps 20 companies for $1 billion ground systems IDIQ

title: Investing in Space: Boeing and SpaceX had a major week that put their differences on display
summary: For longtime readers of Investing in Space, you may notice this newsletter is arriving a day later than typical – my apologies for the delay, but I assume many of you (like me) were watching a livestream or two on what was a historic day for spaceflight.
